item.description:
The SS Fitness Meetup Group, based in the Braintree/Weymouth area, is for those who are interested in physical fitness, whether it be working out, playing a sport, walking or running. Our organizing team searches for group rates for events and lessons to offer the group, including golf & tennis lessons and guided kayaking tours.  With many members stepping up to join the organizing team, we are able to offer a variety of events fo all interests and levels.

New Members: If you are interested in joining the SSFMG, please answer all Profile questions. Upon approval, please log-in and RSVP to any Meetups already scheduled on the calendar.

Please be sure to read the About Us page as this answers many questions you may have about the SSFMG!

Also, check out our Facebook page.  "Like" our page to stay connected with other members and plan other group events outside of meetup.
item.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group
